item.title: When AI Becomes Your DevOps Partner: Cursor + GitHub Pipelines
item.description:
The Moment Everything Changed

I’ve been writing code for decades. I’ve seen tools come and go, each promising to make development easier. But nothing—and I mean nothing—prepared me for what I witnessed last week when I paired Cursor AI with GitHub’s Model Context Protocol (MCP) integration.

Picture this: A desktop application built with AvaloniaUI that needs to be deployed via GitHub Actions. Multiple platform targets. Complex build requirements. And me, giving Cursor a simple instruction: “Make this pipeline work, and push directly to main.”
